Notes: Limited to one for each player
Can be infiltrated to reset the superweapon's timer

rows: Type: Support SuperweaponCost: FreeRecharge Time: 4:00All Blast Trenches release steam, forming an impenetrable barrier that lasts 120 secondsAircraft and subterranean units are destroyed when passing throughCountdown is reset when base is on low power while operationalEpic units are unaffectedLeft-click icon to activate
Type: Defensive PowerCost: $800Recharge Time: 5:00Requires: SpinbladeAll owned Spinblades release steam that increases armor of ground and naval units by 30% around themLeft-click icon to activate
